com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
        • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Enclosing interface:
    BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener

    public static class BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
extends BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent
implements UsesCustomNull
    Structure passed to BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(ConnectionFailEvent) to provide more info about how/why the connection failed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int bondFailReason()
      See BleDevice.BondListener.BondEvent.failReason().
      BleDevice device()
      The BleDevice this BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent is for.
      BleDeviceState highestStateReached_latest()
      The highest state reached by the latest connection attempt.
      BleDeviceState highestStateReached_total()
      The highest state reached during the whole connection attempt cycle.
      BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent[] history()
      Returns a chronologically-ordered list of all BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent instances returned through BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(ConnectionFailEvent) since the first call to BleDevice.connect(), including the current instance.
      boolean isNull()
      Returns whether this BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent instance is a "dummy" value.
      String macAddress()
      Convience to return the mac address of device().
      boolean shouldBeReportedToUser()
      Forwards BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.shouldBeReportedToUser() using status().
      BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status status()
      General reason why the connection failed.
      BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Timing timing()
      Further timing information for BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.NATIVE_CONNECTION_FAILED, BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.BONDING_FAILED, and BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.DISCOVERING_SERVICES_FAILED.
      String toString() 
      BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent txnFailReason()
      If status() is BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED or BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.INITIALIZATION_FAILED and BleTransaction.fail() was called somewhere in or downstream of BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.onEvent(ReadWriteEvent), then the BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent passed there will be returned here.

      • Methods inherited from class com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent

        attemptTime_latest, attemptTime_total, autoConnectUsage, failureCountSoFar, gattStatus

    • Method Detail

      • device

        public BleDevice device()
        The BleDevice this BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent is for.

      • macAddress

        public String macAddress()
        Convience to return the mac address of device().

      • status

        public BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status status()
        General reason why the connection failed.

      • bondFailReason

        public int bondFailReason()
        See BleDevice.BondListener.BondEvent.failReason().

      • highestStateReached_latest

        public BleDeviceState highestStateReached_latest()
        The highest state reached by the latest connection attempt.

      • highestStateReached_total

        public BleDeviceState highestStateReached_total()
        The highest state reached during the whole connection attempt cycle.

        TIP: You can use this to keep the visual feedback in your connection progress UI "bookmarked" while the connection retries and goes through previous states again.

      • timing

        public BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Timing timing()
        Further timing information for BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.NATIVE_CONNECTION_FAILED, BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.BONDING_FAILED, and BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.DISCOVERING_SERVICES_FAILED.

      • txnFailReason

        public BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent txnFailReason()
        If status() is BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED or BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.INITIALIZATION_FAILED and BleTransaction.fail() was called somewhere in or downstream of BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.onEvent(ReadWriteEvent), then the BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent passed there will be returned here. Otherwise, this will return a BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent for which BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent.isNull() returns true.

      • history

        public BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent[] history()
        Returns a chronologically-ordered list of all BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent instances returned through BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.onEvent(ConnectionFailEvent) since the first call to BleDevice.connect(), including the current instance. Thus this list will always have at least a length of one (except if isNull() is true). The list length is "reset" back to one whenever a BleDeviceState.CONNECTING_OVERALL operation completes, either through becoming BleDeviceState.INITIALIZED, or BleDeviceState.DISCONNECTED for good.

      • isNull

        public boolean isNull()
        Returns whether this BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent instance is a "dummy" value. For now used for BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent.connectionFailEvent() in certain situations.
        Specified by:
        isNull in interface UsesCustomNull

      • shouldBeReportedToUser

        public boolean shouldBeReportedToUser()
        Forwards BleDevice.ConnectionFailListener.Status.shouldBeReportedToUser() using status().

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
